body:
Update to new release 1.22.4 implies dependency on texinfo at build time, and preconv ability to detect file encoding is improved when linking it with uchardet. iconv dependency was needed in configure already in 1.22.3 so that dependency was added.
Graphical options with X was added as a variant (false as a default).
Release 1.22.4 accepts parallel build, unlike 1.22.3.
Patch gropdf.patch is also removed since it was never used.
title: groff: new release with many many changes
